short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple dark theme for Udemy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watching your lessons using your new dark theme in udemy.com

Install and Use

Step 1: Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Step 2: Acess udemy.com

Did you like it, or do you want improvements? Your feedback is important to us. Please leave your thoughts and rate us below.

Support: Are there any blank or unstyled elements in the extension? Send us a printout so we can fix it.

Disclaimer: This simple extension is nonprofit and not officially affiliated with Udemy.

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/xdgrxd/udemy-dark-theme
